resources:
// App pas finit!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Arrêter de fumer OK NON Vous devez accorder \"Access Storage Permission\" pour permettre de sauvegarder et charger le journal et les images depuis la carte SD. Ensuite, vous devrez fermer complètement l\'application ou rallumer le portable. Si vous n\'accordez pas ce droit mais que vous voulez utiliser la fonction de capture d\'écran plus tard, vous pourrez accorder la permission plus tard. Ouvrez alors Please open then: system settings - apps - weather. In the permissions section you can grant the \"write storage permission\". //Share Bonne nouvelle : j\'ai arrêté de fumer depuis et J\'ai économisé : cigarettes et de temps. J\'ai arrêté de fumer Mon journal // Menu Réglages Partager Vie Aperçu Journal But // Main Activity Configurer dans les réglages 0.0 € $ £ ¥ jours heures minutes Stopped smoking at: Pas fumé depuis : Sauvegarder : h // Health Activity Bravo - Vous l\'avez fait! Atteint en: Pression artérielle La pression artérielle, la température du corps et le rythme cardiaque reviennent à la normale. (20 minutes) Monoxyde de carbone Le souffle du fumeur disparaît. Le monoxyde de carbone bloque environ 10% des globules rouges pour un fumeur. Ces cellules sont à nouveau disponibles pour l'oxygène après 8 heures. Ataque cardiaque Le risque de mort cardiaque subite baisse. (1 jour) Odorat L\'odorat et les papilles gustatives deviennent plus sensibles; l\'odorat et le goût sont redéfinis. (2 jours) Respiration La respiration devient plus facile. (3 jours) Sevrage de la nicotine Le sevrage physique de la nicotine est effectué. (1 semaine) Capacité L\'ensemble de la circulation sanguine s\'améliore. La capacité des poumons augmente jusqu\'à 30 \%, ils peuvent absorber plus d\'oxygène. Cela améliore les performances physiques. (3 mois) //!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Poils pulmonaires By now, the fine hairs are regrow in the lungs, the smokers cough disappears. Exhaustion and shortness of breath improve progressively. (9 months) Coronary arteries The risk of diseases of the coronary vessels is reduced by half. (1 year) Heart attack The risk of heart attack drops significantly. (2 years) Stroke The risk of having a stroke or a lung cancer die, is substantially lower than earlier. Also the risk of cancers of the mouth is reduced. (5 years) Lung cancer The lung cancer risk is as high as a Non smoking. The lung has almost fully recovered, pre-cancerous cells are replaced by healthy cells. (10 years) Heart attack The risk of heart attack is barely higher than in a Non smoking. (15 years) // Diary Swipe down to load diary Backup successful Add current date Add current time Add a separator line Backup diary Restore diary Delete diary // Goal Choose from gallery Take photo Cancel Load image Rotate image Delete image Costs: Already saved: Remaining: // Settings Tabs Statistics Goal tab App Cigarettes Money Currency Date format Date Time Duration Goal Costs of your goal Next goal Overview tab Health tab Goal tab Diary tab Set number of daily smoked cigarettes, to calculate not smoked cigarettes Costs of a single cigarette. This is used to calculate the saved money since quitting. Set your preferred currency Set your preferred date format. Use it always, when you enter a date. Set date of last smoked cigarette Set time of last smoked cigarette The time you need to smoke one cigarette. This is user to calculate the saved time since quitting. Set the title of your goal. For what will you use the saved money? What are the costs of your goal? Use a integer number. Used to calculate the time when you reach your goal. If you reached your current goal, you can set here a start date for your next goal. This is necessary to calculate the new time when you reach the next goal, while keeping the right statistics from the overview tab. Do you want to use the overview tab? In this tab the main statistics are presented: the time of quitting, saved cigarettes, saved money and so on. Do you want to use the health tab? In this tab the progress of your health benefits are presented: risk oh heart attack, cancer and so on. Do you want to use the goal tab? Here you can set a personal goal. Something you want to use the saved money for. Do you want to use the diary tab? Here you can write a diary with your thoughts, problems and something like this. Perhaps it will help you. Number off daily smoked cigarettes What costs one cigarette? Use your preferred date format Use 24h format: 22:22 Time in hours: 0.2 Name of your goal Use integer number: 199 Changelog What is new? If not, see http://www.gnu.org/licenses. //Changelog Dialog For more informations visit the project site on github:
https://github.com/scoute-dich/QuitSmoking

v 1.1 - v 1.1.2:
• fixed toolbar layout
• added goal tab
• completed english translation

v 1.0:
• first release //String arrays Euro (€) Dollar ($) Pound (£) Yen (¥) 1 2 3 4 International (2016–06–20) German (20.06.2016) 1 2
